thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 31 of 515
thread.title: Amanda Barber

author: Amanda Barber
title: Amanda Barber
text: I was skeptical since things aren't always what they seem these days. I am also hesitant to buy clothes online since I am only 5'00" tall. It can be difficult because even petites aren't really petite. However, keeping that in mind I still wanted to try the products. They are super comfortable, great design and though I'm short, they seem to fit true to size (yes a bit long at times but it wasn't anything I didn't expect). The website is also easy to use.
